statements: SELECT * FROM WordEmbeddings;
SELECT word FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE word_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WordEmbeddings ORDER BY word_id DESC;
SELECT word_id, word FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE word = 'apple';
SELECT * FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE word_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT word_id, word, embedding FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE word = 'apple';
SELECT * FROM WordEmbeddings ORDER BY word_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT word FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE word LIKE 's%';
SELECT word, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM WordEmbeddings GROUP BY word HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT word, SUBSTRING(embedding, 1, 10) AS first_10_bytes FROM WordEmbeddings ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings;
SELECT word_id, embedding_vector FROM word_embeddings WHERE word_id = 10;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM text_classification_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings WHERE word_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM text_classification_models ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings WHERE word_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM text_classification_models ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT word_id, HEX(embedding_vector) AS embedding_hex FROM word_embeddings WHERE word_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT CONCAT('Model ', model_id, ' - ', model_name) AS model_info FROM text_classification_models;
SELECT AVG(model_accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM text_classification_models;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings;
SELECT word, embedding FROM word_embeddings WHERE word = 'hello';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM text_classification_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM model_predictions WHERE model_name = 'model_1' AND predicted_class = 'positive';
SELECT trained_on_date, model_name FROM text_classification_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings WHERE word = 'apple';
SELECT model_name, trained_on_date FROM text_classification_models ORDER BY trained_on_date DESC;
SELECT input_text, predicted_class FROM model_predictions WHERE predicted_class = 'positive' AND model_name LIKE 'model_%';
SELECT DISTINCT model_name FROM model_predictions WHERE model_name IN ('model_1', 'model_2', 'model_3');
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM text_classification_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, word, embedding FROM word_embeddings;
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_version FROM model_info;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_type, model_version FROM model_info WHERE model_version > 1;
SELECT word_id, embedding FROM model_embeddings WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT word1_id, word2_id, similarity_score FROM word_similarity ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM word_embeddings WHERE word = 'apple';
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_version FROM model_info WHERE model_type = 'classification' ORDER BY model_version DESC;
SELECT model_id, word_id, embedding FROM model_embeddings WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND word_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT word1_id, word2_id, similarity_score FROM word_similarity WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT word, embedding FROM word_embeddings WHERE word LIKE 'a%' AND JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(embedding) > 100;
SELECT * FROM WordEmbeddings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, trained_epoch, accuracy FROM ModelInfo ORDER BY trained_epoch DESC;
SELECT model_id, precision, recall, f1_score FROM ModelMetrics WHERE precision > 0.8;
SELECT text FROM InputText WHERE text_id = 2;
SELECT text_id, predicted_class, confidence FROM ClassificationResult WHERE model_id = 3 ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT id, word, embedding FROM WordEmbeddings ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, trained_epoch, accuracy FROM ModelInfo WHERE model_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, precision, recall, f1_score FROM ModelMetrics WHERE precision > 0.9 AND recall > 0.8 ORDER BY f1_score DESC;
SELECT text_id, text, processed_text FROM InputText WHERE LENGTH(text) > 500 ORDER BY text_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT result_id, text_id, predicted_class, confidence FROM ClassificationResult WHERE model_id = 3 ORDER BY confidence DESC LIMIT 5;
